title: Create J M Construction business website

requirements.text: Create a professional homepage showcasing J M Construction as a Kolkata-based sanitary and plumbing contractor with 8 years of experience and 3 decades of family business history

quotes: J M CONSTRUCTION KOLKATA BASED SANITARY AND PLUMBING CONTRACTOR EXPERIENCE 8years In this Field Family Business over 3 dacket

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays company name 'J M Construction'
Experience of 8 years in the field is displayed
Family business heritage of over 30 years (3 decades) is highlighted
Services (sanitary and plumbing contracting) are clearly listed

requirements.text: Create an About section describing the company's expertise in sanitary and plumbing contracting services
acceptanceCriteria: Content emphasizes professional expertise and reliability

requirements.text: Create a Services section listing the main service offerings for residential and commercial clients
acceptanceCriteria: Services section includes sanitary installation and maintenance
Services section includes plumbing installation and repairs
Services are organized in an easy-to-read format

requirements.text: Create a Contact section with a form for potential clients to reach out for quotes or inquiries
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields for name, email, phone, and message
Form validates required fields before submission
Success message is displayed after form submission

requirements.text: Apply a professional, trustworthy design theme appropriate for a construction and contracting business, using warm, earthy tones (such as browns, oranges, or grays) with clean typography and a structured layout that conveys reliability and expertise
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses professional, construction-appropriate colors (avoiding blue and purple)
Layout is structured and conveys professionalism
Overall design communicates trust and expertise

nonGoals: Real-time chat or customer support system
Content management system for dynamic updates

required: Professional hero background image showing plumbing or construction work in progress (hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png)
Company logo featuring construction or plumbing tools with 'J M Construction' text (logo.dim_300x300.png)
Icon representing sanitary services with modern fixtures (sanitary-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Icon representing plumbing services with pipes or wrenches (plumbing-icon.dim_128x128.png)
